awd_titl_txt: Proposal for Network Connection of NORDUNET to the NSFNET
awd_abstract_narration: NSF will share in the costs of operating a data                            communications link between the NORDUnet node in Sweden and the                 NSFNET backbone node at the JvNCnet site in Princeton, NJ.                      NORDUnet links the academic and research networks of five Nordic                countries: Denmark, Finland, Iceland, Norway and Sweden.                        Collectively, the exchange of NORDUnet traffic with the NSFNET                  backbone accounted for over half of the total exchange between                  european countries and the NSFNET backbone as of July, 1989.  The               existing link, heretofore fully paid for by the NORDUNET Project,               is used to capacity for collaborative exchanges between US and                  Nordic researchers.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Computer and Information Science and Engineering
